Coffee Grinder with a Twist: Design a coffee grinder that can grind coffee beans into different shapes and sizes, such as a flat disc, a rounded ball, or a jagged edge. This would allow baristas to create unique and visually appealing drinks, such as a foam heart-shaped latte or a jagged-edged cappuccino.

Smart Coffee Grinder: Develop a coffee grinder that can automatically adjust its grind setting based on the type of coffee bean being used. The grinder would feature sensors that detect the moisture content and density of the beans, and then adjust the grind setting accordingly to ensure the perfect grind for each type of bean.

Portable Coffee Grinder: Create a lightweight and compact coffee grinder that can be easily taken on the go. The grinder would feature a rechargeable battery and a compact design that fits easily into a backpack or purse. This would allow coffee lovers to grind their beans anywhere, anytime.

Automatic Coffee Grinder: Design an automatic coffee grinder that can grind beans while also brewing a perfect cup of coffee. The grinder would feature a built-in coffee maker that grinds the beans to the perfect consistency and then brews the coffee in a separate compartment. This would save time and effort for coffee lovers who want a freshly ground cup of coffee without the hassle of grinding the beans first.

Coffee Grinder with Built-In Scale: Create a coffee grinder that features a built-in scale to measure the amount of coffee ground. The grinder would have a built-in digital scale that can measure the weight of the ground coffee, allowing baristas to accurately measure the amount of coffee used in each drink. This would ensure consistency and precision in each cup of coffee, and also help baristas to save money by accurately measuring the amount of coffee used.
